hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go, I’ll have to deal with the duke’s wrath.
second_translate: If I let you go like this, the duke will humiliate me.
label: well, the duke will give me hell if I just let you go.
hey, boss.
would you like me to...

first_translate: should I cut off their manhood?
second_translate: Should I cut off what's hanging between their legs?
label: ...cut the things dangling between their legs?
hmm...
no, that won't be necessary.
thank you, miss.
we'll never step out of line ever again.

first_translate: we’re so glad you forgave us...
second_translate: we’re so glad you forgave us...
label: thank you for forgiving us--
who said I forgave you?
aaack!

first_translate: my lady, you should close your eyes.
second_translate: My lady, you should close your eyes.
label: lady eunice, you should close your eyes.
I'll cover your ears.
yes?
ah, all right...
all right, we're ready.

hangle: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
first_translate: don’t cut it off, but give them each a good whack.
second_translate: Don't cut anything off. Just hit each of them hard once.
label: don't cut them off, but give them a good pounding.
will do.
gaah...

second_translate: Before we do that, let me do something first.
label: but before that,

first_translate: take a good look at my face.
second_translate: Take a good look at my face.
label: I want you both to take a good look at my face.

hangle: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
first_translate: you should remember who not to bite when you’re carrying out a job.
second_translate: You need to remember which people you shouldn't attack when you're carrying out a mission.
label: you dogs will have to remember who not to bite when you carry out my orders.
yes...
we’re so sorry...
we won’t forget...

second_translate: I think the lecture is over now.
label: I guess that's all for the sermon,
so...

second_translate: It's time to carry out the punishment!
label: ...it's time for the execution!
aaaaah!!
next.
uuugh!!
this place...
...must have been devoured by the darkness.

first_translate: we can’t even recover the bodies...
second_translate: we can’t even recover the bodies...
label: we can’t even bury the bodies...

first_translate: your highness, what will we do now?
second_translate: Your Highness, what will you do now?
label: your highness, what will you do now?

first_translate: we’ll set up a base here...
second_translate: we’ll set up a base here...
label: we'll have to set up base here...

first_translate: ...and start hunting the monsters in the forest.
second_translate: ...and start hunting the monsters in the forest.
label: ...and start hunting for demonic beasts in the forest.

hangle: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
first_translate: lady fiona, wouldn’t it be better for you to stay with the academy researchers?
second_translate: Wouldn't it be better for Lady Fiona to stay with the academy researchers?
label: wouldn't it be better for lady fiona to stay with the researchers from the academy?

first_translate: they seem to have a lot of work to do.
second_translate: It looked like there was quite a lot of work to do.
label: it seems like they have a lot of work to do.
hm...

first_translate: he doesn’t want me to go to dangerous places, huh?
second_translate: He won't let me go to dangerous places, will he?
label: he’s saying this because he doesn't want to put me in danger, huh?
your highness,

first_translate: we should separate personal matters from official duties.
second_translate: We should separate personal matters from official duties.
label: you shouldn’t let your private feelings get in the way of your official duties.

first_translate: this isn’t where I’m supposed to be.
label: this is not where I belong.
you know that.
blush
I see my beauty is working like a charm.

hangle: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
first_translate: let’s work hard since his majesty has given us a decree.
second_translate: I’ve received a decree from His Majesty, so I’ll work hard.
label: since his majesty has given me direct orders, I should do my best to make myself useful.

first_translate: just go out for a little bit at the start.
second_translate: Just step out briefly at the very beginning and come back.
label: you can come along for a little bit at first.
wow.

hangle: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
first_translate: abel needs to come back soon so he can take your place.
second_translate: I hope Abel comes back soon so he can take your place.
label: I hope abel gets here quickly so he can replace you.

first_translate: you’re just trying to make your master do all the work.
second_translate: All you ever think about is bossing your master around.
label: look at you trying to make your teacher do all the hard work.

second_translate: You two still get along well.
label: I see you’re both still two peas in a pod.
what in the world would make you say that?

hangle: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
first_translate: oh my, you’re as friendly as you were in your childhood.
second_translate: I can’t help but notice how affectionate you two are, just like in your childhood.
label: well, you're still just as close as you were when you were kids,

hangle: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
first_translate: you’ve both grown like bean sprouts, though.
second_translate: Although both of you have grown tall like bean sprouts on the outside.
label: only now you've both grown like a pair of beanstalks.
oh.
sir knight, you dropped this.
ah, thank you.
is it yours?

first_translate: yes. would you like to see?
second_translate: Yes. Would you like to see it?
label: yes, would you like to take a look?

first_translate: it’s my wife, who I left at home.
second_translate: She's my wife. I left her at home.
label: that's my wife who's waiting for me back home.

first_translate: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
second_translate: I heard before I left that she was pregnant.
label: I was told she was with child just before I left.
wow!

first_translate: you should have told me that sooner!
second_translate: you should have told me that sooner!
label: why didn't you tell us sooner?!

hangle: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
first_translate: you should be with your wife, not me!
second_translate: you should be with your wife, not me!
label: you should be with your wife, not out here next to me!

first_translate: I can’t help it. it’s my duty.
second_translate: I have no choice. It's my duty.
label: I can’t help it if it’s my duty.

hangle: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
first_translate: but his highness said I could go back before the due date.
second_translate: His Highness said he would let me return before the due date.
label: and duke abel has given me permission to go home before the baby is born.

hangle: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
second_translate: Abel, you work people way too hard!
label: abel is always driving his men too hard!
all right.

hangle: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
first_translate: I’ll help you get back to heylon even faster.
second_translate: I’ll help you return to Heylon even faster.
label: I'll try to get you back to heylon as soon as possible.
thank you!

second_translate: You know, I'm talking about you.
label: you know...

first_translate: I know you have a reason to hurry,
second_translate: I know you have a reason to hurry...
label: even if you have a reason to rush,

hangle: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
first_translate: but if you shoot lightning all over the forest, you’ll scare our troops.
second_translate: ...but if you shoot lightning all over the forest, you’ll scare our troops.
label: you just ended up scaring our men when you shot lightning at them to get them to hurry.
ahaha...

first_translate: but thanks to me, we finished early.
second_translate: but thanks to me, we finished early.
label: well, it got the job done quickly, didn’t it?
oh,
lady eunice!
lady fiona!

hangle: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
first_translate: do you think you can restore this dead land with your power?
second_translate: Do you think Lady Eunice's power can restore this dead land?
label: do you think you could use your powers to revive the dead lands?

first_translate: I think I can do some of it,
second_translate: I think I can do some of it...
label: it would be possible to some extent,

hangle: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
first_translate: but I’ve never seen a dead land this big before...
second_translate: ...but I’ve never seen a dead land this big before...
label: but I've never seen such a vast area of dead lands before...

first_translate: it’s because I’m not strong enough.
label: it's my fault for not being strong enough.
lady eunice...
that's not true.

hangle: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
first_translate: there’s only one saint, but there are many dead lands...
second_translate: there’s only one saint, but there are many dead lands...
label: this much dead land is impossible...

first_translate: it’s too much for you to handle alone.
second_translate: It's too much for you to take on by yourself from the start.
label: ...for one saint to take on.

hangle: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
first_translate: that’s right. it’s not because you’re not strong enough.
second_translate: That's right, Lady Eunice. You're not lacking in any way.
label: that’s right. it's not your fault, lady eunice.

first_translate: don’t be impatient. take your time.
second_translate: Don't rush. Let's take it step by step.
label: don't worry and try to take it one step at a time.

first_translate: that’s right. we’ll help you however we can.
second_translate: That's right. We'll help you with anything you need.
label: yes, we'll do whatever we can to help.

hangle: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
first_translate: if you’re having a hard time, don’t keep it to yourself, my lady.
second_translate: If you run into any difficulties, don’t try to handle them alone, my lady.
label: if you have any problems, please let us know, my lady.
thank you...
with everyone rooting for me,

hangle: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
label: I can’t call myself weak.
I'm sorry for making you worry.
I'll try to stay strong...!

second_translate: Wow, you're really on a roll.
label: wow, that's the spirit.

hangle: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
first_translate: at this rate, she might finish too quickly.
second_translate: I’m worried we might end up finishing this too quickly at this rate.
label: at this rate, I think we might get this over with sooner than later.
oh, I don't know about that...
I was kidding.
